display: PDF Conjurer (backend) | Add image on PDF

AIo.caption: Insert the previous PDF Conjurer Server-side step result
AIo.name: config_info

AIr.caption: If you've used the image before in this workflow, you can just enter the same image name that was entered previously, without having to upload it again
AIr.name: image_info

AIs.caption: Has the image already been used?
AIs.name: have_used_before

AIu.caption: Image custom sizes (if no value is passed, the image will be at its own size, if only width is passed, the height will resize to maintain the image original scale, if only height is passed, the width will be the original image width)
AIu.name: image_info

AIy.caption: Below you will be able to set extra margins for your image element. Leave the box unchecked for a default display. (Will ignore any numbers below)
AIy.name: margin_info

AJE.caption: Is this element being put into the footer?
AJE.doc: Mark this box if this element is to be inserted into the footer.
AJE.name: into_footer

AJF.caption: Is this element being put into the header?
AJF.doc: Mark this box if this element is to be inserted into the header.
AJF.name: into_header

AJG.caption: Is this element being put into a Multi Column?
AJG.name: into_multi_column

AJH.caption: Multi column name
AJH.doc: The name of the multi column you're wrapping this element within.
AJH.name: multi_column_name

AJI.caption: Column width
AJI.doc: Fit content will make the column have the width of their content. Fit available space will extend the column's width to all horizontal avaliable space in the page.
AJI.name: column_width

AJK.caption: Repeating structure auxiliary fields. Only use the fields below if this element is being inserted into a repeating structure
AJK.name: repeating_structure_auxiliary_fields

AJL.caption: Is this element being put into the background?
AJL.doc: Mark this box if this element is to be inserted into the background.
AJL.name: into_background

AJM.caption: Structure name
AJM.doc: The unique name of the repeating structure this image is being inserted into.
AJM.name: repeating_structure_name

AJN.caption: Image list
AJN.doc: Optional. If you fill this field (list of images url), the field "Image" up there must be empty. With this field you can pass a list to be displayed, for example the first image of the list will appear in the first structure. Leave this one blank and the image up there will be used and every repeated image will be the same, this is ideal for images that won't change for example images that are part of the structural design instead of user profile image or product images. If you want to pass multiple user or product images, the pass the list of images here.
AJN.name: image_list
